name: Gokwik-pod
summary: CocoaPod implementation of GoKwik’s Payment SDK for iOS
description: GoKwik democratizes the shopping experience and increases GMV realization for e-commerce businesses. GoKwik believes in a ‘Merchant-First’ philosophy and uses AI/ML technologies to solve hard-hitting problems like Return to Origin (RTO) and improve conversion rates.In Android/iOS apps, the integration is through an SDK that can be easily embedded in your app code.
